name: Flatgallery
body:
###FLAT GALLERY - simple jQuery Gallery with Flat Colors Hi everyone, this is my first code open sourced, enjoy! :) ###How to use: 
	var myImages = [
						...

						{
                            file: 'big image URL',
                            thumb: 'thumb image URL',
                            size: 'image size ',
                            mime: 'image mime type'    
                        }
                        
                        ...

                    ];
	$(element).flatGallery(myImages);
========================================================

shows just the list

    $(".galleryRoot").flatGallery(myImages,{ 
        view: "list", 
        showSizeButtons: false, 
        showViewButtons: false
    });
========================================================

show just the gallery, default view is Thumbs

    $(".galleryRoot").flatGallery(myImages,{ 
        showSizeButtons: false, 
        showViewButtons: false,
        showItemsPerPage: false,
        elementsPerPage: 10
    });

First Basic Example:
